places.name: Helfštýn Castle
places.description: One of the largest castle complexes in Central Europe. Blacksmithing center.

places.name: Přerov Castle & Comenius Museum
places.description: Historical museum with archaeology and J. A. Comenius exhibition.

places.name: Zbrašov Aragonite Caves
places.description: Unique hydrothermal caves in Teplice nad Bečvou.

places.name: Hranická Propast (Abyss)
places.description: Deepest flooded freshwater cave in the world (473+ m).

places.name: Lipník nad Bečvou
places.description: Urban monument reservation with Renaissance square.

places.name: Holy Trinity Column
places.description: 35m tall Baroque sculpture – largest in Central Europe.

places.name: Astronomical Clock
places.description: Unique socialist-realism clock on town hall.

places.name: St. Wenceslas Cathedral
places.description: Gothic cathedral with tallest spire in Moravia (100m).

places.name: 6 Baroque Fountains
places.description: Neptune, Hercules, Jupiter, Triton, Caesar, Mercury.

places.name: Kroměříž Gardens
places.description: UNESCO chateau and gardens ~25 km away.
